Name: Abhishek S
Title: Temple and Water Dam
Review: This temple is one of the 12 jyotirlingas of Lord Shiva from HIndu religion.It is situated near Shirsailam Dam which is worth visiting.You can carry camera but not inside the temple.It also has  good quality food.One can experience the calmness in the environment there.It has 3 types of Darshan depending on the cost and time of the darshan

Name: Devaa
Title: An ancient temple!!!
Review: A place to worship in peace a not to far from Hyderabad. Spread on a huge area this architecturally beautiful temple must be visited and admired. It was not so crowded . Liked the cleanliness of the place.

Name: G.GURU PILLAI
Title: Must visit Temple
Review: I visited this temple with my wife  and we got good memories there.the temple is very neat and maintenance is very great.U can feel the vibration of lord Mallikarjuna.Srisailam is famous for Srisailam Dam & Bhramaramba Mallikarjuna Temple which is dedicated to Lord Shiva. The unique feature of this kshetram is the combination of Jyothirlingam and Mahasakthi (in the form of Bhramarambika) in one campus, which is very rare and only one of its kind. The great religious leader Aadi Sankara is said to have visited this shrine and composed his immortal Sivananda Lahiri here.Srisailam is a perfect combination of temples and scenic spots. Srisailam Dam built over River Krishna is one of the largest dams in South India. Mallikarjuna Swamy Temple, Bhramaramba Devi Temple, Akka Mahadevi Caves, Pathala Ganga, Shikaresvara Temple, Sakshi Ganapathi Temple and Mallela Theertham are the other attractions here.

Name: J Chand
Title: Mallikarjuna swamy... Jyotirlinga
Review: Nice temple. 200 km from Hyderabad. Different queues. Normal queue takes 2 hours in off season and 4 hours on vacation and special days. 300 rupee queue takes short route takes 30 minutes to an hour. 500 rupee queue immediately takes to garbhgruha. Abhishek ti punya possible by paying different payments. Mentioned in website. Cleanliness is maintained. Prasadam can be purchase from counters at different fees as per weigtt of laddu. Self life of prasadam is 15 days.

Name: Footprints727663
Title: Huge Temple
Review: I went to Mallikarjun Temple. The architecture of the ancient Mallikarjun Temple is very beautiful and intricate. The temple has fort like walls, towers and a rich endowment of sculptural work. It is great place to go.

Name: Som00in
Title: Rudrabhishek
Review: I visited the holy place with my friends and guru Ji . There is a direct connecting flight from Lucknow to Hyderabad. We started for Sri Sailam in the morning by road. The route passes through jungle. The place has many good restaurants and hotels . We stayed in Mallikarjuna Sadan. It has all the facilities. You can get north and south Indian food. There are s shops to get the daily need. For rudrabhishek and darshan there is ticket system. This is the only place which has shaktipeeth also. The lingam feels live here. The area and vicinity is very quite and calm. There are stairs going down to patal ganga. One can take a dip there. Enroute you can have fresh fish cooked. The sight of the dam is also worth watching. A must visit place.

Name: sravan
Title: Nice place to visit....
Review: We can have a great day..... Enjoying in summer season will be awesome because of d environment.... No pollution..

Name: Rizu
Title: Religious visit
Review: Temple is beautiful. But management is not good at all. The place is really hot and the exit gate is away from the shoe counter. And will literally end up burning your feet. They have not even laid the carpets properly so that it is convenient for people to walk in the scorching heat. But darshan was really good. This was the only good thing that happened. Inspite of all these difficulties it is a must visit. Is one of the jyotirlinga. And also a shakti peeth.

Name: BRKanth
Title: Best Temple in Nizampet
Review: Been to this place during morning hours and temple is neatly maintained and not much rush. It was a pleasant moment of stay.

Name: S Sewpersad
Title: Well organised
Review: We visited this temple in June after an early morning drive from Hyderabad. Was not too crowded and we all were able to take dharshan comfortably.Well organised and well run.

Name: ravirjy
Title: Spacious temple in nizampet
Review: One of the spacious temple in the nizampet village with big idol and nava graha is also available near to this temple

Name: 609sumanthd
Title: Awsome memories
Review: I visited this temple with my frnds and we got good memories there.the temple is very neat and maintenance is very great

Name: Srikanth_KSLR
Title: Nice and clean temple..
Review: Nice and clean temple.. Two temples- one for Lord Shiva and one for Goddess Parvathi... Very close to Nizampet village..
